subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] QS-SAMPA: a proposed format for plain-text Quickscript
msgSnippet: As I see it, the purpose of using Noon in the news is to enable people to get used to seeing it at the appropriate places. Familiarity breeds . . ability to
messageBody:
As I see it, the purpose of using Noon in the news
is to enable people to get used to seeing it at the
appropriate places.

Familiarity breeds . . ability to use.

--- Paul Tremblay <phthenry@...> wrote:
> I'm a bit confused on the purpose of using Noon in
> the news. What would
> it add? My understanding is that Noon is used to
> make connections easier
> when writing. Since I don't write out the news, but
> have it generated by
> a computer which does not have any more difficulty
> "writing" a Nun after
> a letter than it does writing a Noon after a letter,
> I can't see the
> purpose of using Noon.


===========
Never insult anyone by accident.
- Robert A. Heinlein
